text: What are you trying to do? Kelly is for optimising bet size using ev however in betting markets ev is so dependant on bet size/capacity that it has limits

elements.text: What are you trying to do? Kelly is for optimising bet size using ev however in betting markets ev is so dependant on bet size/capacity that it has limits

text: I want to maximize EV and minimize variance like everyone else :slightly_smiling_face: but yes, you're right, my computed EV is just an estimation and it's very limited. Nevertheless, it's better than just a static betsize. I'm not aware of a better way to do it other than using approximated EV
